post.author: 김승엽
post.content:
Dear member,

I have heard a good news from the Korean Senior Community this afternoon.
There are 35 people who want to take our complimentary PC EDUCATION PROGRAM for Korean senior people.
But we have only 8 people who have shown their willingness to be a volunteer.

So, I will really appreciate if anyone makes up their mind to participate this event as a volunteer.

The more, the merrier.

Best Regards,

Sheon
post.title: The registration status of pc education
